mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone, user_email) values(#{userId}, #{userPasswd}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_volcnt, user_level, to_char(user_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as user_date, user_act, user_repcnt, user_adoptChk from users where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, user_name, user_phone, user_email, to_char(user_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as user_date, user_act, user_repcnt, user_volcnt, user_level, user_adoptChk from users order by user_date
